title: Beating the clock - at sport: the limits of human performance
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Steve Skok and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: One of a series of programmes produced in conjunction with the Youth ANZAAS Science Festival. While looking at the differences in human performances at Olympic Games, the question is raised as to how one person can do so much better than another and why performance times have improved so much
